product_name: The North Face Flex T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Highly breathable mesh panels and soft-to-the-touch fabric of The North Face Flex Crew shirt feel great against your skin. Wear it for long runs in hot weather or grueling workouts at the gym. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking performance fabric offers cooling comfort with a soft touch. Mesh fabric in the high-heat areas under your arms and along your sides ensures you stay comfortable when working up a sweat. Mesh areas also feature an innovative silver salt treatment that fights odors. UPF rating of 30 protects skin in bright sunlight. You'll run farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams. Droptail hem gets rid of lower-back chill when you bend at the waist. The North Face Flex Crew shirt features a relaxed fit.
short_description: Highly breathable mesh panels and soft-to-the-touch fabric of The North Face Flex Crew shirt feel great against your skin. Wear it for long runs in hot weather or grueling workouts at the gym.
